titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Bride's Church, Dublin, April 17. 1698. Upon occasion of a resolution taken in this city, of putting the laws in execution against vice and immoralities / by Pet. Browne.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Peter, ca. 1666-1735.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Ray and are to be sold at his shop in Skinner-Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
